content.content: ARC - Estate Profile - This Dashboard provides a full breakdown of SQL Server, Windows and Linux Servers for a large estate

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Count of all Servers
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| summarize ServerCount = count()

partHeader.title: All Servers
partHeader.subtitle: Servers Registered to Arc

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: All Windows Servers
partHeader.subtitle: Windows Servers Registered to Arc

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: Windows Server DC
partHeader.subtitle: Count of Datacenter Servers

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: Windows Server Std
partHeader.subtitle: Count of Standard Servers

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: SQL Server VMs
partHeader.subtitle: Servers Running SQL Server

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: SQL Server Instances
partHeader.subtitle: All SQL Server Instances

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances'
| extend version = tostring(properties.version)
| extend edition = properties.edition
| extend containerId = tolower(tostring (properties.containerResourceId))
//| where version contains "2012"
| where edition in ("Standard")
| extend SQL_instance = name
//Machine may contain multiple instances - this distinct selects the first (assuming all instances on same machine are same SQL Version)
| summarize SQLStdInstanceCount = count()

partHeader.title: SQL Server Std
partHeader.subtitle: Total Standard Instances

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances'
| extend version = tostring(properties.version)
| extend edition = properties.edition
| extend containerId = tolower(tostring (properties.containerResourceId))
//| where version contains "2012"
| where edition in ("Enterprise")
| extend SQL_instance = name
//Machine may contain multiple instances - this distinct selects the first (assuming all instances on same machine are same SQL Version)
| summarize SQLEntInstanceCount = count()

partHeader.title: SQL Server Ent
partHeader.subtitle: Total Enterprise Instances

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query

partHeader.title: Windows Server 2012
partHeader.subtitle: End of Life 10th October 2023

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances'
| extend version = tostring(properties.version)
| extend edition = properties.edition
| extend containerId = tolower(tostring (properties.containerResourceId))
| where version contains "2012"
| where edition in ("Enterprise", "Standard")
| extend SQL_instance = name
//Machine may contain multiple instances - this distinct selects the first (assuming all instances on same machine are same SQL Version)
| summarize SQL2012InstanceCount = count()

partHeader.title: Std/Ent SQL Server 2012
partHeader.subtitle: End of Life 12th July 2022

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances'
| extend version = tostring(properties.version)
| extend edition = properties.edition
| extend containerId = tolower(tostring (properties.containerResourceId))
| where version contains "2014"
| where edition in ("Enterprise", "Standard")
| extend SQL_instance = name
//Machine may contain multiple instances - this distinct selects the first (assuming all instances on same machine are same SQL Version)
| summarize SQL2014InstanceCount = count()

partHeader.title: Std/Ent SQL Server 2014
partHeader.subtitle: End of Life 9th July 2024

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 2

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend osType = tostring(properties.osType)
| where osType == "windows"
| project osSku
| summarize ServerCount = count() by osSku
| order by osSku asc

partHeader.title: Windows Servers by OS
partHeader.subtitle: Windows Servers on Arc by OS Version

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 2

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend osType = tostring(properties.osType)
| where osType == "linux"
| project osSku
| summarize ServerCount = count() by osSku
| order by osSku asc

partHeader.title: Linix Servers by OS
partHeader.subtitle: Linux Servers on Arc by OS Version

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend coreCount = toint(properties.detectedProperties.coreCount)
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend osName = tostring(properties.osName)
| extend osType = tostring(properties.osType)
| extend Machine_name = name
| where osType == "windows"
| summarize TotalCores = sum(coreCount) by osSku
|order by TotalCores desc

partHeader.title: Cores by Windows OS
partHeader.subtitle: Total Cores for Windows Servers on Arc by OS Version

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend coreCount = toint(properties.detectedProperties.coreCount)
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend osName = tostring(properties.osName)
| extend osType = tostring(properties.osType)
| extend Machine_name = name
| where osType == "linux"
| summarize TotalCores = sum(coreCount) by osSku
|order by TotalCores desc

partHeader.title: Cores by Linux OS
partHeader.subtitle: Cores per Linux OS Version

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend osType = tostring(properties.osType)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by osType

partHeader.title: OS Type
partHeader.subtitle: Operating System Type across Arc Servers

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend osSKu = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend mssqlDiscovered = properties.mssqlDiscovered
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subScriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
| extend SQLFound = iff(mssqlDiscovered == "True",1,0)
| summarize ServerCount = count(), SQLServerCount = sum(SQLFound) by subScriptionName, resourceGroup, osSKu
| order by subScriptionName asc , resourceGroup asc,osSKu asc

partHeader.title: Servers per Subscription, Resource Group
partHeader.subtitle: Servers across all subscriptions, resource groups

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osName == "windows"
| extend Cores = toint(properties.detectedProperties.logicalCoreCount)
| extend Application = tostring(tags.Division)
| extend Location = tostring(tags.Type)
| extend TotalPhysicalMemory =  toint(properties.detectedProperties.totalPhysicalMemoryInGigabytes)
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend os_Name = properties.osname 
| extend osType = properties.osType
| extend osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion)
| extend ESU = properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState
| project Name=name, ESU, Application, Location, os_Name, osType, Cores, TotalPhysicalMemory, osVersion, osSku
| distinct osSku
| summarize DistinctosSKuCount = count()

partHeader.title: Distinct Windows OS SKUs
partHeader.subtitle: Count of Wndows OS deployed

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osName == "windows"
| extend Cores = toint(properties.detectedProperties.logicalCoreCount)
| extend Application = tostring(tags.Division)
| extend Location = tostring(tags.Type)
| extend TotalPhysicalMemory =  toint(properties.detectedProperties.totalPhysicalMemoryInGigabytes)
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend os_Name = properties.osname 
| extend osType = properties.osType
| extend osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion)
| extend ESU = properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState
| project Name=name, ESU, Application, Location, os_Name, osType, Cores, TotalPhysicalMemory, osVersion, osSku
| summarize ServerCount = count() by osSku, osVersion
| order by osSku asc

partHeader.title: OS Version by Windows OS SKU
partHeader.subtitle: Breakdown of Windows OS Versions and OS SKUs

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osName == "windows"
| extend Cores = toint(properties.detectedProperties.logicalCoreCount)
| extend Application = tostring(tags.Division)
| extend Location = tostring(tags.Type)
| extend TotalPhysicalMemory =  toint(properties.detectedProperties.totalPhysicalMemoryInGigabytes)
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend os_Name = properties.osname 
| extend osType = properties.osType
| extend osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion)
| extend ESU = properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState
| project Name=name, ESU, Application, Location, os_Name, osType, Cores, TotalPhysicalMemory, osVersion, osSku
| distinct osVersion
| summarize DistinctVersionCount = count()

partHeader.title: Distinct WIndows OS Versions
partHeader.subtitle: Count of all Versions deployed

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osName == "windows"
| extend Cores = toint(properties.detectedProperties.logicalCoreCount)
| extend Application = tostring(tags.Division)
| extend Location = tostring(tags.Type)
| extend TotalPhysicalMemory =  toint(properties.detectedProperties.totalPhysicalMemoryInGigabytes)
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend os_Name = properties.osname 
| extend osType = properties.osType
| extend osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion)
| extend ESU = properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState
| project Name=name, ESU, Application, Location, os_Name, osType, Cores, TotalPhysicalMemory, osVersion, osSku
| summarize ServerCount = count() by osSku, osVersion
//Count distinct OS Versions for each OS SKU
| summarize osVersionCount = count() by osSku
| order by osSku asc

partHeader.title: OS Versions per OS Sku
partHeader.subtitle: Distinct OS versions per OS Sku

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 2

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances"
| extend SQLVersion = tostring(properties['version'])
| summarize Count=count() by SQLVersion
| order by SQLVersion asc

partHeader.title: SQL Server Instances by SQL Version
partHeader.subtitle: SQL Server count by SQL Version

content.content: Server Distribution by Tag Value - Shows Server distribution by various tag values. Clone and edit for specific tags

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
//Tag value - edit here for alternative tags
| extend application = tostring(tags.Application)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by application
| order by application asc

partHeader.title: Server Distribution by Application
partHeader.subtitle: All Servers by Application tag value

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
//Tag value - edit here for alternative tags
| extend dataCenter = tostring(tags.DataCenter)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by dataCenter
| order by dataCenter asc

partHeader.title: Server Distribution by Data Center
partHeader.subtitle: All Servers by Data Center tag value

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
//Tag value - edit here for alternative tags
| extend businessUnit = tostring(tags.BusinessUnit)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by businessUnit
| order by businessUnit asc

partHeader.title: Server Distribution by Business Unit
partHeader.subtitle: All Servers by Business Unir tag value

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
//Tag value - edit here for alternative tags
| extend location = tostring(tags.Location)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by location
| order by location asc

partHeader.title: Server Distribution by Location
partHeader.subtitle: All Servers by Location tag value

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.detectedProperties.mssqldiscovered == "true"
//Tag values
| extend application = tostring(tags.Application)
| extend location = tostring(tags.Location)
//Operating System
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend osName = tostring(properties.osName)
| extend osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by location
| order by location asc

partHeader.title: SQL Server Distribution by Location
partHeader.subtitle: Count of SQL Servers discovered for each Location

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.detectedProperties.mssqldiscovered == "true"
//Tag values
| extend application = tostring(tags.Application)
| extend location = tostring(tags.Location)
//Operating System
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend osName = tostring(properties.osName)
| extend osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by application
| order by application asc

partHeader.title: SQL Server Distribution by Application
partHeader.subtitle: Count of SQL Servers discovered for each Application

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.detectedProperties.mssqldiscovered == "true"
//Tag values
| extend application = tostring(tags.Application)
| extend location = tostring(tags.Location)
| extend businessUnit = tostring(tags.BusinessUnit)
//Operating System
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend osName = tostring(properties.osName)
| extend osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by businessUnit
| order by businessUnit asc

partHeader.title: SQL Server Distribution by Business Unit
partHeader.subtitle: Count of SQL Servers discovered for each Business Unit

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.detectedProperties.mssqldiscovered == "true"
//Tag values
| extend application = tostring(tags.Application)
| extend location = tostring(tags.Location)
| extend businessUnit = tostring(tags.BusinessUnit)
| extend dataCenter = tostring(tags.DataCenter)
//Operating System
| extend osSku = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend osName = tostring(properties.osName)
| extend osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion)
| summarize ServerCount = count() by dataCenter
| order by dataCenter asc

partHeader.title: SQL Server Distibution by  Data Center
partHeader.subtitle: Count of SQL Servers discovered for each Data Center
